text: Manuel Ojeda (born Manuel Salvador Ojeda Armenta; 4 November 1940 â€“ 11 August 2022) was a Mexican actor. He was known for his telenovela roles. He played Zolo in the movie Romancing the Stone. He was born in La Paz, Baja California Sur, Mexico. His career began in 1975. Ojeda died on 11 August 2022 at the age of 81. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:People from Baja California Sur
title: Manuel Ojeda
